page.title: 08LOCAL NEWS - JUNE 1985
page.content:
Old Buckenham Cricket team won the Manning Cup 6-a-Side Indoor Cricket competition. It was a race against time to get that last run to beat their opponents 96 to 95. Barry Potter set up the victory of the day by scoring 41 runs. Colin Gibbons, the captain, took the cup with pride from Mrs. Manning of Attleborough.
A gardening business called Muck and Muscle was started by a lady called Mrs. Walsh. It is really organic gardening. After ending a 25-year teaching career she started growing herbaceous plants, vegetables and herbs. Mrs. Walsh said "I've got 50 different herbs so far and the number is growing all the time." Mrs. Walsh also hopes to grow and sell rare marsh plants. People can also tour her herb garden.
